website_summaries.verdict: If you've committed to HomeKit for your smart-home setup (and if you own an Apple TV), then this is an easy lock to recommend, but keep in mind that other locks like it are compatible with more products and platforms.
pros: Schlage's HomeKit deadbolt works very well within Apple's smart-home framework, and offers a simple, intuitive app that makes it easy to manage user codes
Voice-activated Siri controls worked like a charm when we tested them out
cons: You won't be able to access the lock from beyond the range of its Bluetooth radio unless you've got an Apple TV hooked up in your home, and the app doesn't dive as deep into HomeKit's standardized controls as others we've seen
The interior of the lock is also bulkier than we'd like

customer_reviews.title: Privacy violation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock a year ago but recent app update has important privacy violation. Buyer aware (Sep 2017): The latest iphone app requires a schlage account sign up which allows Schlage to legally collect and sell your information to 3rd parties. Check out the schlage sense app reviews in App Store first before buying,
customer_reviews.author: James Lin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, does not work as promised
customer_reviews.text: The lock is buggy. I was able to get it to work on bluetooth but it does not work reliably remotely with the Apple TV. It is as likely to not work as to work. Schlage does answer calls for technical support but there is no technical support available for this problem. If you plan to use it only with bluetooth it is a good lock. If you want to be able to see the status of the lock when you are not home or to be able to change the codes on the lock when you are not home, then do not buy this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Better than Kevo, better than a key. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: So we started with a Kevo, which was in every way inferior to a regular key. It would lock or unlock when you just brushed by it; when you really needed to get in the house, the dumb Bluetooth connection would just not work. Hated it. I wanted something that would be keyless, but that would also work. THIS IS IT. Easy to install (just read the directions); operates smoothly as silk; and (most importantly) it just works. Every time. Battery life is a concern for some, but I've had zero trouble -- I think the trick is just making sure the deadbolt isn't touching the hole in the doorframe.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good lock, but too many flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent lock that works pretty well with HomeKit. Things that aren’t so great: - It is loud. Very loud. - The back is giant. - The keypad “buttons” don’t give any feedback when pressed, so you have to be very precise when pressing them. I’ve had it for a few months and it still takes multiple tries sometimes. Because of the keypad, I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - locked me out
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because as soon as I hooked it up to my smartphone, it failed & locked me out. Unacceptable! And, I am a amateur locksmith! Then I find out that in order to use it with wi-fi, I need a $50 adapter that has crappy reviews. I put my previous Yale digital deadbolt back on. If I need wi-fi I’ll get the tried and true August lock system.
customer_reviews.author: J. A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Smart Lock!
customer_reviews.text: I read alot of reviews of all the smart locks out there. I decided to go with this Schlage model based on functions and reviews. Installation was easy with no issues. I also purchased the wifi adapter for this lock. I was up an running in minutes. So far I have had this installed and running for 4 months and even with alot of use my batteries are at 97% !! I have had no issues as of yet. I love the fact I can see when someone is getting home or leaving. Also love the feature to assign a temp code for someone. In all I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lothar1974

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment product
customer_reviews.text: After a month, I got a low battery signal...replace the batteries......2 weeks later same issue.....replace batteries and 2 weeks same....forget about to get in touch with the manufacture, is impossible....just return the product...
customer_reviews.author: guess one

customer_reviews.title: Not the best lock
customer_reviews.text: Pros Reliable - even if it’s hard to close the door due to humidity changes, this lock works. No issues. Cons Hard to open in the dark. If you touch anything to highlight pin pad, lock will think you start entering pin. So if you tapped first digit wrong, you have type next 5 digits, as there is no cancel button. Entering pin works as a toggle. If you left you door open and forgot about it, you will enter pin twice. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Origami

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Current integrated with HomeKit via Apple TV. Everything works great. Schlage app can be configured to use HomeKit with out a Schlage account. Lock opens and closes quickly. Battery life seem good so far but I’ve had it for less than a year. Install is fairly easy though my door lock wasn’t properly aligned to begin with, which caused issues with this lock install. But that’s not Schlage’s fault. My only issue with this lock is the cost. Schlage charges and arm and a leg. I got a like new model to keep the cost down. But matching door handles are equally expensive. I have a double door so a vanity, non-functional door handle is also dumb expensive.
customer_reviews.author: GBeezi

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great phone support
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product.. the setting up after the installation was a bit tricky.. BUT.. Schlage has an OUTSTANDING Best in the business and easy to reach help desk.. and they all speak English.. and they are very helpful.. I called twice.. got someone immediate and was able to get all my codes and questions answered... no hesitation.. buy the real thing with real support
customer_reviews.author: Sally Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Lock / Works Great with Homekit
customer_reviews.text: It's been about a month and I'm extremely happy with this lock. It's built solid and the aged bronze finish is classic. Installation required minor carpentry work due to misalignment of holes on the door. Installation instructions were perfect augmented by many helpful tips and videos on the Schlage site. The Homekit integration works flawlessly. Ability to operate remotely required my Apple TV to be upgraded but I feel was worth it. After a month, battery level is shown as 98% which means I should get a good 2 year life out of 4 AA batteries. Sturdy, reliable, and useful product deserves 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt. Fast to install.  Easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I changed out my old lock for the Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt. Took less than an hour following the easy to follow, accurate instructions. Installed without a hitch. Added the Schlage Sense WiFi Adapter, set up the WiFi and all is in working order. I'm someone who usually is 'third time is a charm', but installed this the first time around! An easy home project for any do-it-yourselfer. Batteries were included!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: great product - easy to install - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: With the purchase of the wifi adapter, I can manage my locks from anywhere with the convenience of my phone - which is fantastic, since I'm constantly worrying, "Did I remember to lock the door?" Just look at my phone and there you see it! Note that each wifi adapter will only support TWO cyber locks. My favorite feature is that I can set notifications, so if my deadbolts are opened while I'm sleeping it will alarm on my phone. I can also delegate access to my kids, so they can open with their smartphone or personal code - and my account tracks when they get home. For the security conscious parent, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Solid Like a Rock Lock
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock, love the color, and love the features. I wished the lock worked beyond bluetooth, but that's okay. Using the app is fine, after you get it installed, which can be a hassle. Schlage needs to work on the technology portion of the app. The lock itself was easy to install, and took about 30 minutes. I was replacing another Schlage lock, so that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Envoy30

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: First unit died at first battery change, company mailed another one free. This second unit had very short Bluetooth range, company sent 3rd unit for free after a long time on the phone. Conclusion: great customer service, flaky product
customer_reviews.author: Arlindo da Silva

customer_reviews.title: I added a second one.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one so much that I added a second one for the back door. the first one took over an hour as I needed to read and understand the set-up. I installed the second one, many months later in 15 minutes. my installation was with Homekit which controls the locks and various other items around the house but they can be installed as stand-alone devices with their own App. Many "smart home" devices are simply not ready for 'prime-time' and are difficult to install and even more difficult to maintain. These locks, I am happy to say are stable and have functioned admirably since the day I installed them.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: app pairing useless
customer_reviews.text: I installed this lock last week with the batteries provided by the manufacturer. Today the lock wouldn't open. It turns out the batteries were dead. That in itself isn't so bad, but what is bad is that there was no warning that the batteries were about to die. The other issue is that I was not able to pair the lock with my iPhone via the Schlage app. After searching on the web (there is no real manual with the lock) it says that to complete the bluetooth pairing, one has to press a button on the lock. The only button that exists on the in side of the lock is for alarm, not for pairing.
customer_reviews.author: gerard

customer_reviews.title: only as good as support
customer_reviews.text: And so far Schlage has none. Have called customer service 4 times with an average wait time of 25 minutes with no answer. I am trying to pair a BP400 wifi bridge with a BE469NX lock, It said to do a factory reset, which I did to the video instructions. When I tried to enter the factory user code, It gave me a green check and a red X. And now any button only gives a red X. The lock does not work at all after following their instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lock!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lock. I don't have Internet at my house so the Bluetooth connectivity was a must and I must admit it works great! It also has an auto lock feature that works great in case you forget to lock the door when coming or going. I did have to replace the batteries after the first month. So far it's been about a month and a half and the second set of batteries are still going
customer_reviews.author: Erica Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Love the smart lock and the ability for remote use.
customer_reviews.text: Have this lock on a condo I own. Love the features. There are some things I would change and features I would add in the app but all in all it works very well. I would buy again. Love unlocking the door with my Apple Watch. Also knowing when someone unlocks the door and who it is, due to the unique codes you can set for individuals is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: kmh22

customer_reviews.title: Works great if upgrading from a Schlage Connect
customer_reviews.text: When Wink decided to start charging for their services, I decided it was time to get rid of Wink. I wanted to upgrade to the Schlage Encode with the built in Wifi from the Connect, but it is a different size from the Connect. This is the exact same size and you can also just swap your old lock cylinder in! Took about 5 minutes to swap out. Is it s pain having to buy a separate wifi adapter, yes, but it is better than sanding a repainting the door around the lock!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This lock will wake up sleeping beauty.
customer_reviews.text: The lock works as described, the issue I have is how loud this lock is... living in a studio with my wife makes this lock less than ideal as it will wake anyone up in the house if used. I can either leave the door unlocked when I leave the house or lock the door and wake up sleeping beauty.
customer_reviews.author: taylor herman

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable or compatible with 5G networks
customer_reviews.text: I thought a lock company would be dependable but clearly, they have not successfully entered into the electronics field. The system went offline while I was out of town, rendering it useless and rendering me informationless. After over an hour on the phone with Schlage, I was told it won't work with an Apple Airport or any 5G network. If you are looking for dependable remote operation and information (like I am as an AirBNB host), I highly recommend looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't install it but it looks good and is ready to lock and unlock. I'm glad they allow you to increase the number of digits used in your code for better security. In hindsight, I probably should have purchased the wireless version to see activity when away from my home. On another note, I recommend replacing the lower door knob to one without a lock in it so there isn't a chance of accidentally locking that.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Every firmware update locks you out of the app
customer_reviews.text: Every time they update the firmware, you're kicked out of the app and forced to log in again (one more password to manage). It's happened two or three times to me since I installed it about 6 months ago. I emailed customer support and they said, "When we have an app update or a firmware update, it does typically make you log-in again (dependent on the phone). Unfortunately there is no way around this." -- Yeah-- that's not fun when you're looking to quickly lock/unlock a door remotely.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Need tickets for world tour to test Schlage lock system!
customer_reviews.text: I remember, my wife forgot keys on our old Schlage lock. We called locksmith, he couldn’t pick the lock, drill through or break it. After 2-3 hours he literally broke the door. My lock on the new house was from another company. I wanted a smart lock so I can allow people in my house remotely. Other brands didn’t quite measure up to my security standards. I spent little more but got the best lock I could afford from Schlage!!! Now I can open the lock from my office. But not sure if I can open it from anywhere in the world. So I need tickets for world tour to test Schlage lock system!
customer_reviews.author: 😊 Happy Camper 😊

customer_reviews.title: Not RING enabled
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this, as it's not Z Wave technology. The other thing I will warn buyers about, check to make sure the keys that come with it work in the lock, before installing, or taking to be rekeyed. They can't be rekeyed by all but a locksmith if there's no working key. Otherwise, they look good, and I returned these, ordered the same in the Z Wave technology for use with the Ring Security system.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie Power! ®

customer_reviews.title: Installation is a pain but lock works fine
customer_reviews.text: Lock works fine but the installation was not easy. It took the locksmith a few times to fix the initial mistake he made. The alignment of the bolt with the motor wasn't right. But finally we got the locks functioning and it's worthwhile. Now I don't need to struggle between opening the storm door, looking for keys and bringing the baby in and out. It's all I need, one touch lock and unlock with a simple code.
customer_reviews.author: Eva W.Brodbeck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lock. Sturdy, app enabled and secure.
customer_reviews.text: I love this as I can program it for cleaner, parents, friends, etc and never have to be locked out again by losing keys or leaving them at the office. This lock is perfect. Secure, safe and looks good on the door too. Multiple codes can be saved, allowing you to enable and revoke a temporary entrance code from your phone. I give my cleaning lady her own code and it can be programmed to only work during the appropriate time and day. Brilliant. Gives lots of peace of mind of never having to worry about being locked out again.
customer_reviews.author: James Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with Ease of Set-Up with the Apple HomeKit.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt I have installed on another one of my Airbnb properties. So far in the four months, I have had this type of lock installed it has worked flawlessly. It works seamlessly with the Apple HomeKit and installing the second lock was a breeze. The only warning I will give is that the bolt has to have unimpeded movement into the door frame. If anything slows it down or stops it the lock will not work remotely or even with the appropriate set code. This can be especially difficult in older homes. For my Airbnb operation, ​it is the exact type of smart lock I was looking for. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: The Colonel-Retired

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT A NEW PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is crazy!! I paid for a brand new lock. This lock came with all the seals broken then I go to install it on a customers house and it is faulty!! Maybe the LAST PERSON WHO BOUGHT IT ALREADY KNEW THAT!! This is very disappointing. Shipped and sold by amazon must not mean anything anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Only for Apple TV Users
customer_reviews.text: I am sure the lock itself is great, but we did not own an Apple TV and did not have a need for one. When I placed my pre-order the description was not as clear that an Apple TV was an absolute necessity. I have read the other reviews and even seen some videos and for those with an Apple Tv, it is probably a great lock, just not for us. We are looking to make our how into a "Smart Home" eventually, but we were not ready to put all our eggs in the Apple basket.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great lock that has worked flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: I have this as my front door lock and it has been flawless. Mine is paired with my AppleTV. The app works well. Homekit works well. It seems to just work. I never have to worry whether or not my kids locked the door and I know immediately when they get home. The ability to assigned codes to different people is also a great feature. I’d definitely buy this lock again.
customer_reviews.author: CPH

customer_reviews.title: Good solid electronic lock.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great! Don't have to worry about a key so that's a plus. The quality is great. The inside lock box is somewhat large but works with the modern design of my new door. I hired a professional to install it and have had not problems. I have not connected it to work with the app yet because I have no real need at this time but I am glad I have the option for the future. So far, I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Stylish Smart Lock
customer_reviews.text: We bought this lock after looking at the endless options out there. It is tried and true and has a nice contemporary look. We added the Schlage Latitude handle and a stainless back plate (due to an old mortise style lock we had). The versatility is perfect for our household: use a key, use a code, use your phone to open the door. We've had this for about 8 months and it still works flawlessly. Apple TV or the similar Schlage component will make it operate best with Apple Home Kit.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY.  They changed their app and force you to give all your info
customer_reviews.text: I liked this lock until they changed their app. Now they force you to log in with an email address, and from what I've read online, they want your home address, and all your info. You can't access the lock anymore unless you sign in with your personal information like email. DO NOT BUY THIS LOCK. I can't log into the app anymore but luckily Apple Home still works, but once it stops working I'm throwing this away and buying a better lock that doesn't want to spy on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a minute
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, but they released a firmware upgrade and my app no longer connects. Nothing I do allows me to connect with the lock through the app. Old passcodes still work, but I am worried about doing a full restart because I don't have the original paperwork with serial numbers and such (which you need to install app correctly). Therefor, I can't give new people access or revoke anyone. Might have to throw it out and reinstall other lock.
customer_reviews.author: Ripken

customer_reviews.title: No keys, great lock
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock! So high tech. No more keys. No more having to take house keys out for a walk or bike ride. And the best part. Very easy to program a code with limited hours/days. Or even a temp code for visitors. Also love that I know when the lock is engaged. Husband can't sneak out anymore. Very easy to install and program. Dord require wifi though. Works with the Schlage app and with the iPhone Home App. Purchased this handle set to go with it:
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: Purchase February 2019 and it lasted only to last week, July 2019. Less than 6 months Update Support was nice they sent a replacement out fairly fast, however the replacement was a refurbished one and it only lasted about a month before starting to act up, stopping completely a week after that. replaced batteries, was not dead batteries because fresh batteries did not make a difference it is dead
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cork

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Remote Functions Do Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware - this product never consistently worked with 3rd gen Apple TV and required a lot of tinkering. When I called Schlage customer service I was told it really requires a 4th gen AppleTV to work properly. Then, Schlage introduced a firmware update that requires users to "sign up" by re-authenticating their email address. The authentication process does not work, which renders to remote function of the lock useless. I called customer service 3 separate time, and while they were always polite they had no fix.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great product but buggy app
customer_reviews.text: Product is great and looks great but the app sometimes fails to read the lock. Installation was easy though and the keycodes have always worked. Highly recommend if you want to go for runs without your keys but prepare for occasional loss of sync between your phone.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Only works on left side doors
customer_reviews.text: Not set up for right side dead bolt as will only turn left and cannot see how you can install for a right hand deadbolt! Second one even after calling Tec support... no one can help... very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Betty Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Makes Life Easier
customer_reviews.text: This changed our lives. Our kids are old enough to remember a code but not really keep track of a key. Knowing they can always get in the house is a comfort. And if you don’t want to give out your code to a neighbor who offers to put a package in your house, you can unlock the door from your phone. The app alerts you when the door is locked and unlocked - also helpful for keeping track of teenagers. It just makes life easier. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock, Easy install
customer_reviews.text: This lock is great! We were afraid of installing this lock ourselves, but it maybe took us 20 minutes. I would recommend watching the YouTube schlage video before purchasing because it has a lot of helpful tips. We use our lock for our Airbnb and it has been easy to manage with the schlage sense app and it works with Google assistant. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: After a year, it still works great!
customer_reviews.text: Had this lock for a year and I must say, I still love it. It has made my life easier in so many ways. I have not used the Alexia feature because there is no need. Still on original batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Auckland

customer_reviews.title: Super happy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Super worth pro install if you don't have Schlage style holes in the door. We had kwickset previously. Works with Siri and set up with phone is easy. Only annoying because the Schlage app only works for one phone but you can control electronically through Siri from a different device.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Would not stay connected to Bluetooth long enough to enter passcode to pair with the app. The app also requires you to passcode your phone, which means I still have to enter a passcode to get in my door, not worth the trouble to use the phone and pay for the Bluetooth capability, I’ll just use the keypad on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Skyking

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Refurb, Counterfeit, or Poor Build
customer_reviews.text: Received in sealed packaging. Once opened was disappointed in the look and feel of the keypad. Compared to the same unit at Home Depot, this one was either refurbished, counterfeit, or poorly manufactured. I returned the unit and ordered a Kwikset Premis instead.
customer_reviews.author: LetsGo

customer_reviews.title: The NEST lock is far better
customer_reviews.text: I love Schalge locks but this thing was just crap. It was impossible to set up, and the EULA for the app plainly states they can and will sell your information to third parties. The lock itself is flimsy and noisy. Ended up getting the NEST by Yale and it's flawless. The Look and finish gets it the extra star.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Russel

customer_reviews.title: Almost pretty much perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. It was so easy to install (less than 15mins with all the predrilled holes) & works great! Was able to sink it with HomeKit right away & I’m now able to lock/unlock from anywhere. I also like the notifications to my phone when someone else unlocks the door. The only small thing I wish it sensed was if the door was closed & the deadbolt was actually IN the wall. I had an issue that I thought the door was locked but it wasn’t since it was left ajar. I’ll probably get a separate ‘closed door’ proximity sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Shaner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for our airbnb to add in guest codes and remove quickly if needed. We ordered an Apple Tv to use along with it for remote access but haven't tried it yet. It was very easy to install along with the mobile app instruction and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Gone Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Not good hardware or app connection
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Got it hooked up then it jammed every time so I reset it and it won’t recognize it at all. This is one of two we put on our garage addition and neither worked. Either jammed or won’t pick up on the app.
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Jenny Baggs

customer_reviews.title: Smart technology is not that smart
customer_reviews.text: Mechanically this is fine. It was easy to install on the hardware side. The Schlage app will jot uodate the lock with my own codes or tell the locks status. Should have just bought a hardware code lock with no “smart (not really)” technology. Grrr
customer_reviews.author: DCI

customer_reviews.title: Would not replace existing Schlage deadbold!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an existing Schlage deadbolt. The packaging was a nightmare. The cable between the front and the back was too short for the lock to be installed. Schlage support only works 8-5M-F and when you get them you are on holed for ever. They do have good music. Returning it to Amazon and looking for other options.
customer_reviews.author: DaveS

customer_reviews.title: Customer support for verification code VERY BAD !!  (lock not programed yet)
customer_reviews.text: Lock installation was ok but the creating an account and getting verification code is HORRIBLE i called all day Saturday 1hr and 50 minutes waitng. Did not reach anyone. Monday morning 35 minutes waiting for someone. They will call me back because they don't know why i don't get a verification code. Support/technical help is Horrendous. I still don't know if i will be able to use the key pad for entry. I can not proceed with installation without verification code. I am not satisfied or happy with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette O.

customer_reviews.title: Keypad does not light up after 3 days - batteries fine
customer_reviews.text: 1 Star changed to 5 Star - prior review with problem follows. Once I called the help 1-800 number on the paper instructions, the person guided me to unisntall and check that a cable had not come loose. I checked and they were correct. It worked perfectly after that and has since for the last couple of weeks. Thanks Schoage! Original Review: Installed with new door by a carpenter. Programmed code myself three days ago, worked perfectly. Now the batteries are fine when tested but the keypad does not light up whatsoever... very frustrating and hard to know where the numbers are at night when the keypad does not light up... anyone know why the keypad does not light up?
customer_reviews.author: CARL AHLERS F.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent lock
customer_reviews.text: I like the Sense....it was a step up from the Connect. It was easy to install. The only thing I hate about this lock is the light on the keypads. It is so hard to see the numbers and the Schlage name during nighttime. You have to hit the keypad to light up the keypad then you can see the numbers. I didn't have that problem with the Connect. Though I couldn't get the Connect to connect despite it's name. The irony in that. Overall, the Sense is a good lock and the app is pretty good. I just wish the keypad would stay lit up better.
customer_reviews.author: Books By the BayTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Good lock but doesn't have some features
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but you have to also buy the wifi connection to properly use it. I was told it had a form of geofence by the rep which opened the lock via bluetooth when I approached. Today I was told the rep was wrong and it only works that way if I also buy something else. The second rep implied it was my fault for not understanding. The three stars vs more is for the missing features as compared to some others.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but lock is slow to lock
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a Yale smart lock. It was super easy to install, i couldn't believe it. Just watch the install video and you are set. I did have to drill a new hole in my fiberglass door for the handleset. I found a diamond tip drill bit worked great, and I didn't even need to use water to keep the but cool. The lock looks and works great, but my only complaint is it's slow to unlock after inputting the code. My Yale lock opened instantaneously. The app also leaves a lot to be desired. I didn't not purchase the hub at this time. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Marquita

customer_reviews.title: Great Homekit Smart Lock
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Schlage Sense door lock - and it's great. As long as the holes in your door are drilled correctly, and your existing deadbolt works without resistance - this lock is a breeze to install. Love that this is integrate to our HomeKit home: it allows us to track when the door is open, as well as give people access to our home without having to track keys. I even use the door unlocking in the evening to trigger lights to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: derf

customer_reviews.title: Makes monitoring access to your home so easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy! I can create codes for anyone coming into the house and track exactly when they arrived and when they left. A good way to give access to plumber, electrician, etc. Using Homelink, I can set up codes remotely and I get an alert when anyone uses their code. I can also remotely check the status of the lock and lock it if someone in the house inadvertently left it unlocked. I wouldn't be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Trialanderror

customer_reviews.title: The keypad is troublesome
customer_reviews.text: The way the keypad is designed causes a lot of mistakes. You'll need to be patient with this lock. The number pad doesn't work flawlessly. It missed a lot of touches and you'll have to be extremely careful to press the numbers correctly otherwise the pad misses it and you get an error. My wife hates it. The other model that has the buttons are much better. The Wifi module i got to operate it didn't set up. The tech support let's you on hold for hours and they tell you to watch Youtube or to go to their internet site if you need support. Don't by this model and don't upgrade it to use wifi or 4G.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: My kids love the SIRI command to open the door
customer_reviews.text: The install went very well and the kit is very well thought out to install rapidly. The system only works with apple IOS so don't bother with this if you are using Android phones. You need to be replacing a deadbolt hardware set as it does not contain any parts to drill the holes yourself. BE CAREFUL: your door deadbolt has to effortlessly open and close or the system will not work. If you have to jiggle the key, or pull the door tightly closed while turning the key, this will not work for you. My kids love the SIRI command to open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Monahan

customer_reviews.title: The locks work great and so does the app
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these locks because they work with Apple HomeKit. The locks work great and so does the app. The finish on these locks gives a very high end appearance. My problem is with the bluetooth connectivity. Outside of my application these locks would not work due to distance constraints. My home is 1,400sq ft and I have these locks on the same side as my Apple TV which I had to move because if the Apple TV was in my bedroom as it was originally it would not effectively communicate with these locks rendering the app and remote features useless. They also have a solid 15-30 second lag time when using the app.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service, product not stable
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a couple of months. Then after iOS 10 upgrade, I had to update the firmware. This didn't work. Customer service on weekends has one or at best two people. Was in the wait queue for 90+ minutes. Rep was helpful but the upgrade still didn't work and I can't connect to the lock with my phone. Their customer service hours are limited and they close due to weather conditions. What if I had been locked out and didn't have the physical key with me? It's 12 degrees outside.
customer_reviews.author: Pranava Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt with Century Trim in Satin Nickel (BE479 CEN 619)
customer_reviews.text: WOW...IMPRESSIVE! Great Smart Deadbolt Lock...Installation was quick and painless. Quality appears to be very good...The Schlage name has a great reputation. Using the Scalage app is a breeze...nice & easy. Functions well and responses quickly with Siri...Works Great. THE APPLE TV MUST STAY ON. DISABLE SLEEP MODE ON APPLE TV...(Set Sleep Mode To: NEVER). *****AS OF MONDAY, DECEMBER 21, 2015...MY REMOTE ACCESS; AWAY FROM HOME WORKS FLAWLESSLY***** - My Apple TV is about 28 feet away from the Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt. - Away from home I am on the AT&T LTE network.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Good product, budget for more
customer_reviews.text: Lock works great, nice to have programming features in app. I think its ridiculous to advertise works with Alexa when you have to buy separate adapter and it’s not cheap. Or like most other products can’t use a Zwave hub has to be their product. I’ve loved the Schlage products but this hurt as a loyal customer that I have to pay $80 more to get full features.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Prochnow

customer_reviews.title: Works well but doesn't connect with Ring
customer_reviews.text: It works well, no complaints about that. It would be a 5-star if it only offered connectivity with Ring. For some reason this particular lock cannot be added to Ring as a third party device. Not sure if it's a Ring problem or Schlage's, but seems important to mention here.
customer_reviews.author: Obormot

customer_reviews.title: Works with Apple TV 4K
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to install. The setup is not too difficult if there is a video for it. The video for setup HomeKit with Apple TV 4K doesn't seem to exist so it took me longer to set it up with HomeKit which allowed to control the lock remotely.
customer_reviews.author: dukexm

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my short term rental. When I had my first airbnb customers, it didnt work!! I ended up having to call a locksmith to come out. Basically it was a defective unit. The locksmith had to put in a different ( other than schlage) unit. Amazon wont refund me because it was out the the return policy time frame. Not happy at all. I might have to rethink using amazon for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pedro

customer_reviews.title: This is the best smart lock out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smart lock out there! I purchased the latest version of the Apple TV to be able to use Home Kit with Siri to open or lock the door and it works great. Every had that feeling of did I lock the door? Hit Siri and tell her to lock the door and bang it is done! If the lock is already locked it stays locked, it doesn't cycle the lock from locked to unlocked with the Siri command! It is great to be able to go outside with out having to take the key with you!
customer_reviews.author: Sivart

customer_reviews.title: hard programming issues.
customer_reviews.text: So I love how it looks etc but 24hrs later I still can't get it to work and or program 🙃 I tried manually and through the app it wants to update and nothing on the videos happens when steps are followed I just have a feeling codes are wrong or I'm dumb I have no clue my husband couldn't get it programed either...
customer_reviews.author: johanys

customer_reviews.title: Forget about Remote Access with this
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviews here, I can't get remote access to work at all using the Apple TV, and remote access is the main reason I purchased this. Additionally, the troubleshooting steps that Schlage support walked me through has caused ALL OF MY OTHER HOMEKIT DEVICES to also loose remote access (they were working fine before). Wish I just stuck with my zwave deadbolt... That had plenty of problems itself, but this is surprisingly worse, since it doesn't work at all remotely. Left 2 stars because the lock itself is nice. If they can manage to provide a more reliable remote access solution I will revisit this rating.
customer_reviews.author: Herman Deville

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Very Convenient! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great lock! Would highly recommend this. It also works with the Apple Home. This is very convenient as you can provide codes for individuals and allow them only certain days/times to have access to the house. Having your own unique code is great, this way you know who is going into and out of your house. Easy to set up! You can change access whenever you want on the app and you can even remotely into the lock to unlock it if there is a guest you don't want to have access. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I have had too many reliability issues to recommend this lock. On paper, the features are everything I need. In real life, many features don’t always work and it is difficult to troubleshoot and fix problems. As of today, I can’t get the lock to always lock using the keypad and it disconnects sporadically from my WiFi (router is 10 ft from the lock.
customer_reviews.author: ESteveK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and install - makes life much simpler
customer_reviews.text: I have already had a Schlage Sense lock installed about a year ago, and it has worked flawlessly. I decided to purchase another to install on a cellar door that is frequently used. Going Keyless is so much more convenient; I wanted a lock that was HomeKit compatible and looked at other locks. I landed on the Schlage Sense because of my positive experience with my other lock and having the keypad is built-in is some much more convenient. The installation took me about 30mins and about 10 Mins to setup on the Schlage App. I recommend​ this lock to all my friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M.

customer_reviews.title: LOUD.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a few months now and overall love it. We rarely remotely unlock it, but its a nice feature. However, its a big trade off because the motor is so loud, and if I have a free hand to punch in the code, I just assume turn the lock too.
customer_reviews.author: Blake M

customer_reviews.title: Great Smartlock
customer_reviews.text: I originally had a all-in-one smartlock that had WiFi built in. That worked for a while, but the Wifi I was connected to was commercial and it was off and on and didn't always connect. This combination worked great and it works perfectly. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend for rental or for primary residence
customer_reviews.text: Schlage makes great locks. I like the Schlage Sense since there is an app for it with my iPhone. This a great lock to put on the door to the garage, then the kids can get into the house without needing a key. Codes are also good for rental units. Battery life has held up well. This deadbolt is relatively safe.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Boy

customer_reviews.title: Not wifi ready. Needs more parts for that
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as it was advertised to work directly with WiFi. It does each not work directly with WiFi and there is no remote control for it, only Bluetooth control which means you need to be near the product for the product or application to work. Not good for Airbnb. So now I have to return and replace which is more headache
customer_reviews.author: N. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Works & Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my 5 year old lock so let's hope it lasts longer than that one. I like the looks of the faux silver stainless touch pad (on my stainless lockset) vs a big honking black one like i had before. Phone app upgrade is a great way to unlock the door and keep track of codes for others to use. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ikilya

customer_reviews.title: It works well and having the key pad is great. You can assign different codes to different people ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our back door. It works well and having the key pad is great. You can assign different codes to different people so it makes it convenient if you have someone that comes for repairs etc. You can easily delete their code when they are done and not worry about them accessing the house without you knowing. I haven't figured out how to set it up to work with my Apple TV yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product, you really don't realize how much you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, you really don't realize how much you need this until you have it and don't have to fumble with keys all the time! The installation is pretty straightforward although with odd sized doors it requires some additional steps. Ours was wider than normal so we needed to request more parts from the manufacturer but it was pretty seemless and then sent them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lock! From a security standpoint, you receive an alert on your phone whenever the lock is unlocked or locked, with no monthly fees. It's connected to my Apple TV, so I can lock or unlock from anywhere. It's easily programmable to assign someone a code, like a pet sitter, allowing them access. You can even set the codes up to work for certain periods of time. With the alerts, you will know when they come or leave.
customer_reviews.author: Trina A

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and does the job
customer_reviews.text: This lock was easy to install and it has been working well since we got it last month. My only complaint is the lock is super loud when it locks/unlocks and doesn’t seem all that smooth. We really like being able to make codes for guests in the app.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my lock about a year ago, and it suddenly stopped working. I tried replacing the batteries with no luck. Otherwise, the lock worked as intended. *update* Schlage's customer service is great, and they are replacing the lock. If u get the lock just know you might have to have them replace it. But it's nice to have the option of doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Great Security
customer_reviews.text: Much better than previous Schlage push Botton locks, easy lock/unlock. Pairs with iPhone HomeKit controls and firmware updates come through regularly versus most IOT devices. The lock is easy to install and once installed doesn't have to be perfectly aligned with the strike plate as it seems to adjust itself. I use rechargeable batteries in it and the app from Schlage also shows you battery level so I know when to recharge. Great lock all around and is easy to install/update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: The lock itself works great and I have it integrated with apple HomeKit with no issues. The Schlage app is clunky and not all that reliable but I rarely use it so it has no impact on me experience. Overall is has worked very well and the keypad and actual lock mechanism are great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: First one bad but replacement one works great and reliably -- great support!
customer_reviews.text: First one didn't work well, but customer support was tremendous -- friendly, helpful, and very knowledgeable -- and the replacement they sent worked like a charm. There were known production issues early on so a replacement may be needed. Another reviewer mentioned that if you're having trouble and the Bluetooth range is only 5 feet or so then you probably have a defective unit and a call to customer support is needed. The replacement unit can talk to our Apple TV (4th gen) from around a corner and across a 20-foot room. Remote or within Bluetooth range it has taken at most about 10 seconds to access the door and usually is almost instant.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. The app is awful and connecting has been a challenge. The keypad is hard to see and the lock does not always register the taps, you have to press hard for the code to work. It’s jsut ok,not a great product.
customer_reviews.author: MewMew

customer_reviews.title: This lock is awesome. Love that you can create different codes for ...
customer_reviews.text: This lock is awesome.Love that you can create different codes for different people so you know who came and went - cleaner, electrician, kids, etc. It lets you know the time as well. So if the house cleaner charges by the hour and says they were there for three hours you can confirm that.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kakalec

customer_reviews.title: Best keyless entry system
customer_reviews.text: This keypad system is one of my favorite lock system. I’m a locksmith and came across with many others electronics keyless entry and schlage sense are the most I recorded in term of security, system features and long lasting built lock system mechanical and electronic functionality. See Pics.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Lock down this lock!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Required some adjusting for my door frame for the lock to work properly but that might just be my house built in 1988. The unit has been working great and solved problems of keys for guests and repairs.
customer_reviews.author: William Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Very  nice lock
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Glad to have a lock that can be used without carrying a key around. Only bad part is that the numbers can be difficult to see in bright daylight. However, once you are used to using it, even that doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Flafan

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work remotely as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lock hoping to be able to see when people enter and leave while not home (friends, family, maids, etc.). Schlage does not keep their software up to date with Apple's updates. At first lock worked great remotely, but now it does not work whenever away from the house and cannot update the firmware on lock since new Apple update. I would definitely go with a different lock. Will not purchase again until Schlage gets up to speed with their software functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Samford

customer_reviews.title: Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt with Camelot Trim
customer_reviews.text: Lock was easy to install, works with my android phone. I like the auto lock feature, I have it set to auto lock after 3 min. Each time I unlock my phone to use it, it shows me if the door is locked or unlocked. Works just as it should.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Mikita

customer_reviews.title: Schlage sense
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to set up Schlage app but it Seems like you have to purchase the wifi adapter to set up on phone.
customer_reviews.author: ron belcher

customer_reviews.title: I needed this
customer_reviews.text: The install process was easy. Only took 45 minutes to change out and linking the app to my lock was easy however, I think I may need to order the WiFi extender for Schlage. For some reason, the door and the apps continue to fall out of sync.
customer_reviews.author: D Mackin

customer_reviews.title: I love this lock
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love this lock. Its integration with iPhone and Siri simplify the process of locking and unlocking the door. Also, being able to check my Schlage app to see if I remembered to lock the door when I left is peace of mind I been searching for since I began carrying keys. There seems to be a battery drain issue common in these locks. This is an issue I may have experienced, but I'm not quite sure. I did change the original, month-old batteries after experiencing connectivity issues. But I checked the charge left in the original batteries and found about 85% of battery life still present. So, I can't say for sure what was causing the connectivity issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Quick Installation & Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install & super easy to use.. having the option to assign access codes to different people is awesome & easy to do with the app. It looks very good on the door and not bulky looking.
customer_reviews.author: Headstrong_girl

product_meta.title: Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt with Century Trim in Satin Nickel (BE479 CEN 619)
product_meta.description: Style:Century| Color:Satin NickelThe Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt with Century Trim in Satin Nickel makes daily life easier and more convenient. Enter an access code on the touchscreen to unlock the door instead of searching your pockets for keys. Pair the lock with your smartphone over Bluetooth . Share access with trusted friends and family with just a few taps in the Schlage Sense app – no more keeping track of spare keys. The Schlage Sense lock is easy to install yourself in minutes. It’s battery operated so there’s no hardwiring required, and the lock will still accept access codes if the power goes out at home. Typical battery life with average use is about one year, and the low battery indicator reminds you weeks in advance to replace it. You can update the lock wirelessly through the app as new features are released, which means you never have to buy a new lock to take advantage of the latest capabilities. Add the Schlage Sense Wi-Fi Adapter (sold separately) to your home Wi-Fi network to lock/unlock from anywhere on Android smartphones, iPhone , iPad or iPod touch . Or, if you have an iPad /Apple TV connected to your home Wi-Fi network, you can control the lock from your iPhone as part of your HomeKit-enabled smart home.
feature_bullets: Hands-free voice control requires Schlage Sense WiFi Adapter and Alexa device (sold individually)
Free iOS and Android smartphone app lets you manage codes, set schedules and view usage history
Lock and unlock from anywhere by pairing with the Schlage Sense WiFi Adapter (sold separately)
Pair with Apple HomeKit devices to use with iOS and Siri voice control only. Door thickness range - 1 3/8 to 1 3/4 inches thick door kit extends 1 7/8 to 2 1/4 inches
Secure encryption.Keying: 5-pin tumbler, C keyway with one key

specifications.Warranty Description: Limited Lifetime mechanical and finish warranty; 3 year electronics warranty
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,134 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
